name: Ankh: Tutankhamen no Nazo
overview: Ankh Tutankhamen no Nazo is a first person adventure game in which the player is called by professor Yoshimura Sakuzi to come to Egypt, after his father died and when he arrives there a fortune teller tells him that Egypt had been waiting for him 300 years. He decided to find the legendary valley with the help of the professor to discover the mystery of Tutankhamen. The gameplay is a classic first person perspective adventure game with lots of full motion video sequences all in japanese language.
